KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 key pair for SSH access to the EC2 instance.

SSHLocation.Description: The IP address range that can be used to SSH to the EC2 instances
SSHLocation.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

UserData.Fn::Base64:
#!/bin/bash
yum update -y
yum install -y httpd24 php56 mysql55-server php56-mysqlnd
service httpd start
chkconfig httpd on
groupadd www
usermod -a -G www ec2-user
chown -R root:www /var/www
chmod 2775 /var/www
find /var/www -type d -exec chmod 2775 {} +
find /var/www -type f -exec chmod 0664 {} +
echo "<?php phpinfo(); ?>" > /var/www/html/phpinfo.php

Properties.GroupDescription: Enable HTTP access via port 80 + SSH access
